gov.nasa.jpf.vm

Class GenericSGOIDHeap

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.jpf.vm.GenericHeap
      • gov.nasa.jpf.vm.GenericSGOIDHeap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Heap, Iterable<ElementInfo>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OVHeap, PSIMHeap

    public abstract class GenericSGOIDHeap
extends GenericHeap
    abstract Heap trait that implements SGOIDs by means of a search global Allocation map and a state managed allocCount map

      • getNewElementInfoIndex

        protected int getNewElementInfoIndex(AllocationContext ctx)
        Description copied from class: GenericHeap
        this is called for newXX(..) allocations that are SUT thread specific, i.e. in response to a explicit NEW or xNEWARRAY instruction that should take the allocating thread into account
